module.name: Simple output
Simple input
module.description: System's first audio input channel is accessible with this module.

module.name: Stereo output
module.description: This module has two inlets, the audio signal connected to them will be played on the system audio output device.

module.name: Simple sine
module.sc: arg freq=440, amp=1, outbus; Out.ar(outbus, SinOsc.ar(freq,0,amp));

module.name: Example LFO
module.description: A simple low frequency oscillator, it runs at a constant frequency 1Hz.

module.name: Example LFO 2
module.description: A simple low frequency oscillator, which runs at a constant frequency of 8Hz.

module.name: White noise
module.description: This module emits white noise through its only outlet.

module.name: Pink noise
module.description: This module is a pink noise source.
module.sc: arg out, gain = 0.2; Out.ar(out, gain * PinkNoise.ar());

module.name: Sine oscillator
module.sc: arg freq=440, amp=1, outbus; Out.ar(outbus, SinOsc.ar(freq,0,amp));

module.name: Simple mixer
module.description: A simple 4-channel mixer with no way to regulate gain.
module.sc: arg in1, in2, in3, in4, out; Out.ar(out, In.ar(in1) + In.ar(in2) + In.ar(in3)+ In.ar(in4));
